appRoles.description: Allows the app to manage the organization's Exchange environment without any user interaction. This includes mailboxes, groups, and other configuration objects. To enable management actions, an admin must assign the appropriate roles directly to the app.
Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read events of all R without a signed-in user
Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write calendars in all mailboxes

appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete tasks in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write tasks in all mailboxes

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read user tasks in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read user tasks in all mailboxes

appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write all user mailbox settings

appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write contacts in all mailboxes

appRoles.description: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write mail in all mailboxes

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to read events of all calendars without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to send mail as any user without a signed-in user.
Allows the app to have full access via Exchange Web Services to all mailboxes without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Use Exchange Web Services with full access to all mailboxes

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.
Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.
Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
Application permission grants permission to move mailboxes between Office365 organizations
Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.
Allow application to access user’s mailbox via IMAP protocol
Allow application to access user’s mailbox via POP protocol
Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.
Download all reports via the Office 365 reporting web service
Allows the app to have send access to all mailboxes
appRoles.displayName: Application access for sending emails via SMTP AUTH

appRoles.description: Allows the application to read tenant-wide people settings without a signed-in user.
Allows the application to read and write tenant-wide people settings without a signed-in user.
appRoles.displayName: Read and write all tenant-wide people settings

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: This allows application to host MyDay Owa powered experience for both user and shared mailbox and calendar
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: This allows application to host MyDay Owa powered experience for both user and shared mailbox and calendar

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: This allows application to host MyDay Owa powered experience for shared mailbox and calendar
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: This allows application to host MyDay Owa powered experience for shared mailbox and calendar

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: This allows the application to host MyDay Owa powered experience
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: This allows the application to host MyDay Owa powered experience

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via IMAP protocol.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail via IMAP
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to be able to send emails from the user’s mailbox using the SMTP AUTH client submission protocol.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Access to sending emails from your mailbox  using SMTP  AUTH
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to send emails on your behalf from your mailbox.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Access to sending emails from your mailbox

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via POP protocol.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail via POP
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your company's places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your company's places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via Exchange ActiveSync.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app full access to your mailboxes on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read mail a user can access, including their own and shared mail.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read mail you can access, including shared mail.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail a user has permission to access, including their own and shared mail. Does not include permission to send mail.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user and shared mail
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete mail you have permission to access, including your own and shared mail. Does not allow the app to send mail on your behalf.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write mail you can access

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as the signed-in user, including sending on-behalf of others.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Send mail on behalf of others
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as you or on-behalf of someone else.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Send mail on behalf of others or yourself

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in all calendars that the user can access, including delegate and shared calendars.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in all calendars that you can access, including delegate and shared calendars.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete events in all calendars in the organization user has permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user and shared calendars
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete events in all calendars in your organization you have permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write to your and shared calendars

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read contacts a user has permissions to access, including their own and shared contacts.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read contacts you have permissions to access, including your own and shared contacts.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete contacts a user has permissions to, including their own and shared contacts.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user and shared  contacts
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete contacts you have permissions to access, including your own and shared contacts.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write to your and shared contacts

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings. Does not include permission to send mail.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user mailbox settings
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create, and delete your mailbox settings.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write to your mailbox settings

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete user tasks
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Create, read, update and delete user tasks
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete your tasks
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Create, read, update and delete your tasks

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read user tasks
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read your tasks

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage the organization's Exchange environment, such as mailboxes, groups, and other configuration objects. To enable management actions, an admin must assign the appropriate roles to the app user.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to manage your organization's Exchange environment, such as mailboxes, groups, and other configuration objects. To enable management actions, an admin must assign you the appropriate roles.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read and write to the ranked list of relevant people of the signed-in user. The list includes local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write users' relevant people lists (preview)
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, and write to your relevant people list. This includes your local contacts, your contacts from social networking, people listed in your organization's directory, and people from recent communications.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDisplayName: Read and write your relevant people list (preview)

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a ranked list of relevant people of the signed-in user. The list includes local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that's most relevant to you. This includes your local contacts, your contacts from social networking, people listed in your organization's directory, and people from recent communications.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of users in your company or school on behalf of the signed-in user. Includes display name, photo, and email address.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties from users in your company or school. Includes display name, photo, and email address.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, and write a set of the current user's profile properties in your company or school. Includes display name, photo, and email address.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, and write a set of profile properties in your profile. Includes display name, photo, and email address.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a set of the current user's profile properties in your company or school. Includes display name, photo, and email address.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read a set of profile properties from your profile. Includes display name, photo, and email address.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read group properties. Additionally allows the app to update group properties for groups the signed-in user owns. Also allows the app to read and write group calendar and conversations on public groups and groups the signed-in user is a member of.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read group properties. Additionally allows the app to update group properties on your behalf, for groups you own. Also allows the app to read and write group calendar and conversations on public groups and groups you are a member of.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read group properties on behalf of the signed-in user, and read group calendar and conversations on public groups and groups the signed in user is a member of.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read group properties on your behalf, and read group calendar and conversations on public groups and groups you are a member of.

publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete contacts in your contact folders.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in user calendars.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in your calendars.

publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to send mail as you.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete events in all calendars in the organization user has permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.
publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write user and shared calendars
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete events in all calendars in your organization you have permissions to access. This includes delegate and shared calendars.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read events in all calendars that the user can access, including delegate and shared calendars.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read user's mailbox settings. Does not include permission to send mail.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's mailbox except body, previewBody, attachments and any extended properties.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read email in your mailbox except body, previewBody, attachments and any extended properties.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed SKUs and tenant branding information.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDescription: Download reports via the Office 365 reporting web service
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the app to download reports via the Office 365 reporting web service on your behalf.

publishedPermissionScopes.adminConsentDisplayName: Read and write tenant-wide people settings
publishedPermissionScopes.userConsentDescription: Allows the application to read and write tenant-wide people settings on your behalf.
